scripts.network: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=5173 concurrently "npm run dev -w ui" "npm run launch:tauri" "holochain-playground"
scripts.test: pnpm run test:zomes && pnpm run test:ui
scripts.test:zomes: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm t -w tests
scripts.launch:tauri: echo "pass" | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/requests-and-offers.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network mdns
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run package -w ui && hc web-app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive
